greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Positive integers n such that n divides 16^n - 1.
comment: Also, positive integers n such that n divides A014931(n).
program: A014957_list = [n for n in range(1,10**6) if n == 1 or pow(16,n,n) == 1] # _Chai Wah Wu_, Mar 25 2021
results.author: _Olivier Gérard_
